isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - INSTALL - AIR FILTER AND REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: On thirteen-speed transmissions, lubricate the O-ring with a silicon lubricant such as Dow Corning #111 Silicone Grease or equivalent. Put the O-ring for the filter and regulator assembly in the port in the piston housing cover ( Figure 350).
Put the filter and regulator assembly on the top of the range cylinder.
Install the mounting bolts and washers. Tighten the bolts to 10 to 13 Nm (85 to 115 in-lbs.).

Connect the RED air line to the SUPPLY port on the filter and regulator assembly. Connect the air line from the air supply system to the SUPPLY port on the slave valve (stamped letter "S" on the valve).
